|website = |footnotes = }} Matamoros is one of the 67 municipalities of Chihuahua, in northern Mexico. The municipal seat is Mariano Matamoros. The municipality covers an area of 1,139.5 kmÂ². In 2010, the municipality had a total population of 4,499. == References == Category:Municipalities of Chihuahua
